name: Tiima's Sacrifice
description:
The ancient god Uguun is angry and there is only one way to appease him again: Sacrifice the animals he chose to him! But he is too angry to communicate clearly so use his hints and find the right animals. Beside that you have to care for your farm and the food production of your village. Good luck!

Tiima's Sacrifice is a puzzle / strategy game made for the Ludum Dare 43 competition in 72 hours.
